channel.title: Slay3r Inc. - Creation Unleashed
channel.description:
[/center]Hello, and welcome to the Slay3r Inc. Project thread, here you will find all you need to know about our project goals, progress, and how to get involved. So let's begin.[left][font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]Slay3r Incorporated -[/b][/u][/size][/font][/left]Slay3r Inc is a small business run and maintained by [user]Demetri[/user] and [user]ẨřЌαdĩαņ[/user], Two very capable and well known programmers for their work in the fields of Client, and Server development.
Personally, we meet people EVERYDAY who are looking for a server, a good server to play, not some over-used, badly programmed server, run by 12 year old, or a straight download and run. People we meet want something new, something big, something that has a purpose.
I have seen servers out there with, 400 players online, which are run by [b]complete[/b] idiots, who abuse members, sell items unfairly and are purely in the game for profit, with bugged servers, duping strife, and I wonder, 'Why are people putting up with this [b]CRAP[/b]?', and now I know.
It is because people do not have a choice, yes it may be shit, but it is the best shit that is available to these poor people, which is why we bring to you, Slay3r Inc., [i][u]It's what we deserve.[/u][/i][right][font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]...The Difference...[/b][/u][/size][/font]
"Yeah, yeah, I have heard it all before" - Is this what you are thinking? You have seen countless project threads, no matter how promising all saying they are different, exciting, new and will be a change, and they all end up failing the same way, so who is to say that this won't be the same story as the rest?[INDENT][INDENT][u] It is simple.[/u][/INDENT][/INDENT][INDENT] [/right] [ul][li]We are [b]not[/b] competing for money.[/li] [li]We are [b]not[/b] doing this as a 'learning' experience.[/li] [li]We are [b]not[/b] making a game simply how we want it.[/li] [li]We are [b]not[/b] trying to re-create RuneScape.[/li] [li]We are [b]not[/b] setting ourselves unreachable goals.[/li][/ul] [/INDENT]This will be different for the simple fact, We are [b]organized[/b], we are [b]prepared[/b], we are [b]skilled[/b], and we are [b]ready[/b].
You can believe us or not, the result will be the same we [b]WILL[/b] succeed, we [b]WILL[/b] progress, and we [b]WILL[/b] make it.[left][font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]Slay3r Realms[/b][/u][/size][/font][/left]Slay3r Inc. - As a project will be based around a single [i]Game-Platform[/i] which players will download and play from, the [i]Game-Platform[/i] will be connected to 5 Different Realms, each one completely seperate from the others each realm is a different, and unique server, that matches different peoples needs and likes in a server.
Please note; All Servers will be given names - We just have not officially named any yet.[left][size=1.45em][b][u]Adventure Server;[/u][/b][/size]
The 'Adventure Server' will be based throughout all of the RuneScape world. This world is designed for players who like a challenge, and the feeling of accomplishment when they earn levels, and money.
The Economy will be strong, and slow, with every popular mini-game and skill available. This server will cater for those who want to skill for money, and play a high quality server, with a greater purpose.
[u][b]Key Features;[/b][/u] [/left] [ul][li]18 Fully functional skills from anywhere on the map[/li] [li]7 Fully Functional Mini-games[/li] [li]Over 40 Achievements + Mini-Quests[/li] [li]Economy requiring every skill[/li] [li]Fully Functional Game world no matter where you are[/li] [li]Over 1000 Monsters and Civilians throughout the map[/li] [li]Instant Access to over 15 cities via Boats / Free teleports[/li][/ul] [center][size=1.45em][b][u]New School Pk Server;[/u][/b][/size]
Fast, Accessible, Easy. The New School Pk Server is the place for the newer generation of RuneScaper's to relax.
[u][i]Key Features;[/i][/u]
[ul][li]Fast Training - a 99 Skill within 1 hour.[/li] [li]PvP Areas + Wilderness[/li] [li]Kill based Achievements + Pk Statistics[/li] [li]5 Mini-games avaliable incl. Godwar Dungeon[/li] [li]Dragon Claws, Godswords, PvP Items, - All avaliable.[/li][/ul] [/center][right][size=1.45em][b][u]Old School Pk Server;[/u][/b][/size]
The Pk server for those who liked to pk where skill was a factor, not just massive hits and luck. [INDENT] [/right] [ul][li]Fast Training - a 99 Skill within 1 hour.[/li] [li]Old School Wilderness - Mage Bank etc.[/li] [li]NO Dragon claws, Godswords, Crossbows.[/li] [li]Item's easily accessible, but not free.[/li] [li]Hotkeys, Combo's, Rushing, Detailed Pking.[/li] [li]Over 100+ different outfits to mix and match[/li][/ul] [/INDENT][center][size=1.45em][b][u]F2P Server;[/u][/b][/size]
This server is for all you F2P fans, for those who loved maging in Varrock on a level 10 mage, or storming the wilderness with a friend in full rune. Bind, Prot Melee, Str Pots only. No Teleblock. Green D Hide Pking.
[ul][li]Full F2P Map Avaliable[/li] [li]Medium Training - a 99 Combat skill within 2 - 3 hours.[/li] [li]Only F2P Items, Spells, and Skills available.[/li] [li]Duel Arena Enabled.[/li] [li]14 Full skills avaliable.[/li][/ul] [/center][size=1.45em][b][u]SandBox Server;[/u][/b][/size]
Woohoo! This is the SandBox server, based off a popular concept created by [user]ẨřЌαdĩαņ[/user], In this server All items are free, no money is needed You can have any level, at any time you like, and pk anywhere, at anytime. Pure Mayhem.
[ul][li]Instant Leveling[/li] [li]No Money Economy[/li] [li]Instant Items[/li] [li]Huge Range of Items[/li] [li]Full Wilderness and PvP Cities.[/li] [li]Kill Statistic System w/ Highscores.[/li][/ul] [right][font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]Slay3r Game-Platform[/b][/u][/size][/font]
Possibly the most notable feature in Slay3r Inc. is the Game-Platform Also known as the "Client", this will be what all players, using any of the Realms will be using the connect, They will be able to switch realms instantly through a very cool and advanced Realm Switcher which is based off RuneScapes World Switcher, This Game-Platform is also very customizable, and one of the most advanced Clients available in the RuneScape Private Server world, With features such as;[/right][center][img]http://i30.tinypic.com/4r96j5.png[/img]
[ul][li]377, 459, 474, 480, 508, and 525 Gameframe switching[/li] [li]New Hitmarks, HP Bars, and Context menus, All Toggleable[/li] [li]12 unique tabs with high quality interfaces, incl. Clan Chat[/li] [li]Full HD fullscreen option, with full HD login, and SD login.[/li] [li]Updated Animations, Graphics, NPCs, Objects and Items.[/li][/ul] This Platform is almost COMPLETELY customizable for all of your needs and all the features will be available in every realm so you can change anything to just the way you like it, But want to know the best thing?[/center][left][font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]Slay3r Inc. Giving back to Community[/b][/u][/size][/font][/left]To show our gratitude of your support, we believe in giving back, So do you like our Platform? Guess what, We will be releasing it for [b]anybody[/b] to use! Along with a [b]range [/b]of servers that are enabled for the Platform to use, All for free, So ANYBODY will be able to download a popular server enabled with our Platform use and create their own server with all the awesome features people want!
We will also be offering a website dedicated to developing Slay3r servers and Realms. Where anybody can get involved and learn![center][size=2em]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
Enough talk about what we plan to do, Check out what we have already done and follow our progress to realizing this amazing goal of ours!
[font=book antiqua][size=2em][u][b]Current Progress[/b][/u][/size][/font][/center][b]Legend / Index[/b]
[Quote] Not Started Started Almost completed Completed [/Quote][SPOILER="Skills"] [b][u][font=book antiqua][size=1.45em]Skills;[/size][/font][/u][/b]
[b][u]RuneCrafting -[/u][/b]
RuneCrafting will be set up similar to RuneScapes but with a twist, To start you will need to speak to aubury, who will teleport you to an underground maze-type area, Initially, The first opening is full of Rune Essence rocks where you can mine ess, after that, the tunnel, and the [b]WILDERNESS[/b], Begin, Altars will be positioned all through the maze, the higher the altar, the deeper and harder it is to find, This dungeon will be full of pkers and abyssal monsters, Maximum wilderness level is 13.
[ul][li]Base RuneCrafting (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Rune Essence Mining[/li] [li]Level vs Rune Multipliers[/li] [li]Rune Pouches[/li] [li]RuneCrafting Arena[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Mining -[/u][/b]
This skill is planned to just be like RuneScape.
[ul][li]Base Mining (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Rocks dying / Respawning[/li] [li]Pickaxe + Level Multipliers[/li] [li]Multiplayer Mining[/li] [li]Different Rocks give different amount of ores / take longer to respawn[/li] [li]Random gems + All rocks mineable.[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Smithing -[/u][/b]
Planned to work just like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Smithing (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]All Ores Smeltable[/li] [li]Iron Ores with 50% Fail rate (Ring Of Forging)[/li] [li]All Items smith able on anvil[/li] [li]Super-Smelt[/li] [li]Gold / Crafting Smelting / Smithing[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Woodcutting -[/u][/b]
Planned to work just like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Woodcutting (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Trees turning into Stumps (Dif respawn times)[/li] [li]Level + Axe Multipliers[/li] [li]Different trees give different amounts of logs[/li] [li]Multiplayer Woodcutting (Works on Tree HP System)[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Fletching -[/u][/b]
Planned to Work Like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Fletching (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]All Logs into ( u ) Bows, or Shafts[/li] [li]Flax to BowString to Full Bow[/li] [li]Arrow Making (Feathers, Shafts, Arrow Heads)[/li] [li]Bolt Making[/li] [li]Crossbow Making[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Fishing -[/u][/b]
Planned to work Like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Fishing (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Fishing Spots Expiring[/li] [li]Level increases catch speed[/li] [li]Different spots take longer to respawn[/li] [li]Fishing spots work over entire map[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Cooking -[/u][/b]
Planned to work like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Cooking (Basic Cooking)[/li] [li]Perfect Burn / Cook Formula[/li] [li]Fish stop burning at certain level[/li] [li]Cooking gauntlets effect burning[/li] [li]Ranges Cook better then fires[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Herblore -[/u][/b]
Planned to work like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Herblore (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Potion Mixing (Any dose)[/li] [li]Filling Vials[/li] [li]Grimy Herb system[/li] [li]Full Secondary Ingrediant[/li] [li]Ground Spawn and ingredients[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Thieving -[/u][/b]
Planned to work like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Thieving (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Stall Items being removed[/li] [li]Level / Being caught rate[/li] [li]Higher Stalls longer to respawn[/li] [li]Large amount of items from pickpocket[/li] [li]Gaurds on stalls[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Crafting -[/u][/b]
Planned to work like RuneScape
[ul][li]Base Crafting (Basic Skill)[/li] [li]Gem Crafting[/li] [li]All Dragon Hide crafting[/li] [li]Leather Crafting[/li] [li]Full Jewelry Making [/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b][u]Slayer -[/u][/b]
Planned to be like RuneScape
[ul][li]4 Different Slayer Masters[/li] [li]Over 50 NPC Tasks[/li] [li]Ability to reset tasks for cost[/li] [li]Full Slayer Item Range[/li] [li]Slayer Gem[/li][/ul] Video; - Avaliable when completed Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed
[b]Important Note; Firemaking, Agility, and Farming will NOT be avaliable in initial server as serve no important purpose.[/b] [/SPOILER]
[Spoiler="Combat"]
As in every Server, Combat is a hugely important part of a server, and the fun, Therefore we will be doing all we can to make it as flawless, and realistic as possible, this doesn't mean just making it as similar to RuneScape as we can, it is also about making things as realistic as they should be.
Here is how we plan to do things;
[b]Legend / Index[/b]
[Quote] Not Started Started Almost completed Completed [/Quote][size=2em]Melee;[/size]
[ul][li]Full Attack Requirements[/li] [li]Full Strength Requirements[/li] [li]Full Defense Requirements[/li] [li]All Weapon Bonuses[/li] [li]Accuracy Formula[/li] [li]Max Hit Formula[/li] [li]Defense Formula[/li] [li]Weapon Speeds[/li] [li]Special Attacks[/li][/ul] [size=2em]Range;[/size]
[ul][li]Projectile / Speed Formula[/li] [li]Animations and Bow Graphics[/li] [li]Arrow + Bow Attack Bonuses[/li] [li]Defense Bonuses (Mage Resistant)[/li] [li]All Bow Bonuses[/li] [li]Accuracy Formula[/li] [li]Max Hit Formula[/li] [li]Special Attacks[/li][/ul] [size=2em]Magic;[/size]
[ul][li]All Spells Working[/li] [li]Projectile Graphics[/li] [li]Animations[/li] [li]Staff Bonuses (Unlimited Runes)[/li] [li]Accuracy Formula[/li] [li]Max Hit Formula[/li] [li]Rune Required For All Spells[/li] [li]Teleports Setup (Free - No Levels Needed)[/li][/ul] [/Spoiler]
[Spoiler="Mini-Games"]
Mini-Games are the things that keep us entertained when we need a break and we will do our best to deliver the fullest and most rewarding mini-games we can.
Mini-Games will be simply named as we will be re-creating them as closely as possible
[b]Legend / Index[/b]
[Quote] Not Started Started Almost completed Completed * = Custom Minigame [/Quote][size=2em]
Duel Arena Fight Caves Fight Pits Warriors Guild Clue Scrolls Godwars Dungeon Mage Arena Zombie Wars* Collective Pk* [/size]

item.title: Slay3r Inc. - Creation Unleashed
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

lol, layout for this looks nice…but will the project look nice?

Read full topic

item.title: Slay3r Inc. - Creation Unleashed

Can you add some pictures? on’t really wanna read all that atm but looks nice by the little i did read.

Read full topic

item.title: Slay3r Inc. - Creation Unleashed
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Jonny_J Teh Jonny J
item.description:
@Teh_Jonny_J wrote:

[/center]Hello, and welcome to the Slay3r Inc. Project thread, here you will find all you need to know about our project goals, progress, and how to get involved. So let’s begin.[left][font=book antiqua][size=2em]Slay3r Incorporated -[/size][/font][/left]Slay3r Inc is a small business run and maintained by [user]Demetri[/user] and
[user]ẨřЌαdĩαņ[/user], Two very capable and well known programmers for their work
in the fields of Client, and Server development.

Personally, we meet people EVERYDAY who are looking for a server, a good
server to play, not some over-used, badly programmed server, run by 12 year
old, or a straight download and run. People we meet want something new,
something big, something that has a purpose.

I have seen servers out there with, 400 players online, which are run by
complete idiots, who abuse members, sell items unfairly and are purely in
the game for profit, with bugged servers, duping strife, and I wonder,
‘Why are people putting up with this CRAP?’, and now I know.

It is because people do not have a choice, yes it may be shit, but it is the best
shit that is available to these poor people, which is why we bring to you, Slay3r
Inc., It’s what we deserve.[right][font=book antiqua][size=2em]…The Difference…[/size][/font]

“Yeah, yeah, I have heard it all before” - Is this what you are thinking?
You have seen countless project threads, no matter how promising
all saying they are different, exciting, new and will be a change, and
they all end up failing the same way, so who is to say that this won’t be
the same story as the rest?[INDENT][INDENT]
It is simple.[/INDENT][/INDENT][INDENT]
[/right]
[ul][li]We are not competing for money.[/li]
[li]We are not doing this as a ‘learning’ experience.[/li]
[li]We are not making a game simply how we want it.[/li]
[li]We are not trying to re-create RuneScape.[/li]
[li]We are not setting ourselves unreachable goals.[/li][/ul]
[/INDENT]This will be different for the simple fact,
We are organized, we are prepared,
we are skilled, and we are ready.

You can believe us or not, the result will be the same we WILL
succeed, we WILL progress, and we WILL make it.[left][font=book antiqua][size=2em]Slay3r Realms[/size][/font][/left]Slay3r Inc. - As a project will be based around a single Game-Platform
which players will download and play from, the Game-Platform will be
connected to 5 Different Realms, each one completely seperate from the others
each realm is a different, and unique server, that matches different peoples
needs and likes in a server.

Please note; All Servers will be given names - We just have not officially named
any yet.[left][size=1.45em]Adventure Server;[/size]

The ‘Adventure Server’ will be based throughout all of the RuneScape world.
This world is designed for players who like a challenge, and the feeling of
accomplishment when they earn levels, and money.

The Economy will be strong, and slow, with every popular mini-game and skill
available. This server will cater for those who want to skill for money, and play
a high quality server, with a greater purpose.

Key Features;
[/left]
[ul][li]18 Fully functional skills from anywhere on the map[/li]
[li]7 Fully Functional Mini-games[/li]
[li]Over 40 Achievements + Mini-Quests[/li]
[li]Economy requiring every skill[/li]
[li]Fully Functional Game world no matter where you are[/li]
[li]Over 1000 Monsters and Civilians throughout the map[/li]
[li]Instant Access to over 15 cities via Boats / Free teleports[/li][/ul]
[center][size=1.45em]New School Pk Server;[/size]

Fast, Accessible, Easy. The New School Pk Server is the place for the
newer generation of RuneScaper’s to relax.

Key Features;

[ul][li]Fast Training - a 99 Skill within 1 hour.[/li]
[li]PvP Areas + Wilderness[/li]
[li]Kill based Achievements + Pk Statistics[/li]
[li]5 Mini-games avaliable incl. Godwar Dungeon[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws, Godswords, PvP Items, - All avaliable.[/li][/ul]
[/center][right][size=1.45em]Old School Pk Server;[/size]

The Pk server for those who liked to pk where skill was a factor, not just
massive hits and luck.
[INDENT]
[/right]
[ul][li]Fast Training - a 99 Skill within 1 hour.[/li]
[li]Old School Wilderness - Mage Bank etc.[/li]
[li]NO Dragon claws, Godswords, Crossbows.[/li]
[li]Item’s easily accessible, but not free.[/li]
[li]Hotkeys, Combo’s, Rushing, Detailed Pking.[/li]
[li]Over 100+ different outfits to mix and match[/li][/ul]
[/INDENT][center][size=1.45em]F2P Server;[/size]

This server is for all you F2P fans, for those who loved maging in Varrock on
a level 10 mage, or storming the wilderness with a friend in full rune.
Bind, Prot Melee, Str Pots only. No Teleblock. Green D Hide Pking.

[ul][li]Full F2P Map Avaliable[/li]
[li]Medium Training - a 99 Combat skill within 2 - 3 hours.[/li]
[li]Only F2P Items, Spells, and Skills available.[/li]
[li]Duel Arena Enabled.[/li]
[li]14 Full skills avaliable.[/li][/ul]
[/center][size=1.45em]SandBox Server;[/size]

Woohoo! This is the SandBox server, based off a popular concept created
by [user]ẨřЌαdĩαņ[/user], In this server All items are free, no money is needed
You can have any level, at any time you like, and pk anywhere, at anytime.
Pure Mayhem.

[ul][li]Instant Leveling[/li]
[li]No Money Economy[/li]
[li]Instant Items[/li]
[li]Huge Range of Items[/li]
[li]Full Wilderness and PvP Cities.[/li]
[li]Kill Statistic System w/ Highscores.[/li][/ul]
[right][font=book antiqua][size=2em]Slay3r Game-Platform[/size][/font]

Possibly the most notable feature in Slay3r Inc. is the Game-Platform
Also known as the “Client”, this will be what all players, using any of the
Realms will be using the connect, They will be able to switch realms
instantly through a very cool and advanced Realm Switcher which is
based off RuneScapes World Switcher, This Game-Platform is also
very customizable, and one of the most advanced Clients available
in the RuneScape Private Server world, With features such as;[/right][center]

4r96j5.png765×503

[ul][li]377, 459, 474, 480, 508, and 525 Gameframe switching[/li]
[li]New Hitmarks, HP Bars, and Context menus, All Toggleable[/li]
[li]12 unique tabs with high quality interfaces, incl. Clan Chat[/li]
[li]Full HD fullscreen option, with full HD login, and SD login.[/li]
[li]Updated Animations, Graphics, NPCs, Objects and Items.[/li][/ul]
This Platform is almost COMPLETELY customizable for all of your needs
and all the features will be available in every realm so you can change
anything to just the way you like it, But want to know the best thing?[/center][left][font=book antiqua][size=2em]Slay3r Inc. Giving back to Community[/size][/font][/left]To show our gratitude of your support, we believe in giving back,
So do you like our Platform? Guess what, We will be releasing it for
anybody to use! Along with a range of servers that are
enabled for the Platform to use, All for free, So ANYBODY will be able
to download a popular server enabled with our Platform use and
create their own server with all the awesome features people want!

We will also be offering a website dedicated to developing Slay3r
servers and Realms. Where anybody can get involved and learn![center][size=2em]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

Enough talk about what we plan to do, Check out what we have already done
and follow our progress to realizing this amazing goal of ours!

[font=book antiqua][size=2em]Current Progress[/size][/font][/center]Legend / Index

[Quote]
Not Started
Started
Almost completed
Completed
[/Quote][SPOILER=“Skills”]
[font=book antiqua][size=1.45em]Skills;[/size][/font]

RuneCrafting -

RuneCrafting will be set up similar to RuneScapes but with a twist, To start you will need to speak to aubury, who will teleport you to an underground maze-type area, Initially, The first opening is full of Rune Essence rocks where you can mine ess, after that, the tunnel, and the WILDERNESS, Begin, Altars will be positioned all through the maze, the higher the altar, the deeper and harder it is to find, This dungeon will be full of pkers and abyssal monsters, Maximum wilderness level is 13.

[ul][li]Base RuneCrafting (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]Rune Essence Mining[/li]
[li]Level vs Rune Multipliers[/li]
[li]Rune Pouches[/li]
[li]RuneCrafting Arena[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Mining -

This skill is planned to just be like RuneScape.

[ul][li]Base Mining (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]Rocks dying / Respawning[/li]
[li]Pickaxe + Level Multipliers[/li]
[li]Multiplayer Mining[/li]
[li]Different Rocks give different amount of ores / take longer to respawn[/li]
[li]Random gems + All rocks mineable.[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Smithing -

Planned to work just like RuneScape

[ul][li]Base Smithing (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]All Ores Smeltable[/li]
[li]Iron Ores with 50% Fail rate (Ring Of Forging)[/li]
[li]All Items smith able on anvil[/li]
[li]Super-Smelt[/li]
[li]Gold / Crafting Smelting / Smithing[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Woodcutting -

Planned to work just like RuneScape

[ul][li]Base Woodcutting (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]Trees turning into Stumps (Dif respawn times)[/li]
[li]Level + Axe Multipliers[/li]
[li]Different trees give different amounts of logs[/li]
[li]Multiplayer Woodcutting (Works on Tree HP System)[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Fletching -

Planned to Work Like RuneScape

[ul][li]Base Fletching (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]All Logs into ( u ) Bows, or Shafts[/li]
[li]Flax to BowString to Full Bow[/li]
[li]Arrow Making (Feathers, Shafts, Arrow Heads)[/li]
[li]Bolt Making[/li]
[li]Crossbow Making[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Fishing -

Planned to work Like RuneScape

[ul][li]Base Fishing (Basic Skill)[/li]
[li]Fishing Spots Expiring[/li]
[li]Level increases catch speed[/li]
[li]Different spots take longer to respawn[/li]
[li]Fishing spots work over entire map[/li][/ul]
Video; - Avaliable when completed
Site Blog; - Avaliable when completed

Cooking -

Planned to work like RuneScape

[ul][li]Base Cooking (Basic Cooking)[/li]
[li]Perfect Burn / Cook Formula[/li]
[li]Fish stop burning at certain level[/li]

[Spoiler=“Combat”]

As in every Server, Combat is a hugely important part of a server, and the fun, Therefore we will be doing all we can to make it as flawless, and realistic as possible, this doesn’t mean just making it as similar to RuneScape as we can, it is also about making things as realistic as they should be.

Here is how we plan to do things;

[Spoiler=“Mini-Games”]

Mini-Games will be simply named as we will be re-creating them as closely as possible
